format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Kaizen Inventor Detail"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "employee", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "EMPLOYEE CODE"}, {"fieldname": "employee_name", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "EMPLOYEE NAME"}, {"fieldname": "department", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "DEPARTMENT"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Kaizen Detail"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "baseline", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "BASELINE"}, {"fieldname": "existing_method", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "EXISTING METHOD"}, {"fieldname": "change_to_be_made", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "CHANGES TO BE MADE"}, {"fieldname": "applicable_to", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "APPLICABLE TO"}, {"fieldname": "to_dept", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "DEPARTMENT"}, {"fieldname": "kaizen_saves", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "KAIZEN BENIFIT"}, {"fieldname": "cost", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "COST REDECTION"}, {"fieldname": "workflow_state", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "KAIZEN HELPS IN"}, {"fieldname": "time", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "TIME REDUCTION"}, {"fieldname": "effort", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "EFFORT REDUCTION"}, {"fieldname": "quality_improvement", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "QUALITY REDUCTION"}, {"fieldname": "if_other", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "IF OTHER"}, {"fieldname": "uses_of_kaizen", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "USES OF KAIZEN"}]
html:
KAIZEN



{%- if(doc.applicable_to=='Specific Department') -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if(doc.if_other) -%} {%- endif -%}
KAIZEN ID :{{doc.name}}
EMPLOYEE NAME :{{doc.employee_name}}
DEPARTMENT :{{doc.department}}
BASELINE :{{doc.baseline}}
EXISTING METHOD :{{doc.existing_method}}
CHANGES TO BE MADE :{{doc.change_to_be_made}}
APPLICABLE FOR :{{doc.applicable_to}}
DEPARTMENT : {%- for row in doc.to_dept2 -%} {% if row.department%}{{ row.department}}
{% endif %}{%- endfor -%}
KAIZEN BENIFIT : {%- if(doc.cost==1) -%}COST REDUCTION,  {%- endif -%} {%- if(doc.time==1) -%}TIME REDUCTION,  {%- endif -%} {%- if(doc.effort==1) -%}EFFORT REDUCTION,  {%- endif -%} {%- if(doc.quality_improvement==1) -%}QUALITY IMPROVEMENT{%- endif -%}
OTHERS :{{doc.if_other}}
USES :{{doc.uses_of_kaizen}}
name: Kaizen
